name: 哥布林的资本主义世界/The Capitalist World Of Goblin
name_original: 哥布林的资本主义世界/The Capitalist World Of Goblin
description:
The Capitalist World Of Goblin is a strategy game with humorous events
It describes some war stories that took place on a continent called Gredy. The dark forest law shrouds this continent and the greedy and violent power frightens other races and infects all forces.
Becoming evil and killing madly to get money bath
Or endure the shadow, gather strength from the sand millet and dump its greed and violence, It's all up to you!
Game features
1. Focus on conquest mode and expand other play modes
2. Unique leader and hero cultivation system
3. Rich fashionable pictures
